Test Scenarios: Verify the visibility of the customer ID filed
Test Case Title: Verify the customer ID field is present.
Expected Result: The manager can enter the ID in the customer ID filed

Test Case Title: The customer ID field can't be empty.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the customer ID field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"Customer ID is required".

Test Case Title: The customer ID field can't contain any character.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the ID containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The customer ID field can't contain any special character.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the ID containing special characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"Special characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The customer ID field can't start with empty space.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the ID containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"Customer ID shouldn't start with empty space".

Test Case Title: The account number field can't be empty.
Test Steps:
1- Leave the account number field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"account number is required".

Test Case Title: The account number field can't contain any characters.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The account number field can't contain any special character.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number containing special characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"Special characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: The account number field can't start with space.
Test Steps:
1- Enter the account number containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"account number shouldn't start with empty space".
